text: Scientific American is a popular science magazine, published (first weekly and later monthly) since August 28, 1845, making it the oldest continuously published magazine in the United States. It brings articles about new and innovative research to the non-scientific audience. == Other websites == * Online edition of Scientific American with partially free access to the current issue. * Online archive (not free) of the issues from 1993 to the present. ** Information about the archive * Online archive of Scientific American between 1846 and 1869. * Category:Science and technology magazines Category:American monthly magazines
title: Scientific American
